name: micro-frontend-workspace
description: Micro Frontend workspace with Module Federation

scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:header" "npm run start:products" "npm run start:shell"
scripts.build: npm run build:header && npm run build:products && npm run build:shell
scripts.analyze: npm run analyze:header && npm run analyze:products && npm run analyze:shell
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd header-mfe && npm install && cd ../products-mfe && npm install && cd ../shell && npm install
scripts.test: cd header-mfe && npm test && cd ../products-mfe && npm test && cd ../shell && npm test
